sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) as UTC_TAG_COUNT FROM log.source_register_table
WHERE ETL_UTC_TAG > '@{pipeline().parameters.Master_Utc_Tag}'
AND (ETL_IS_PROCESSED = 'N' AND ETL_RUN_STATUS IS NOT NULL)
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_run_status is not null
			   and etl_utc_tag > '@{pipeline().parameters.Master_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'ADJ_MNL_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_ASSET_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'BGT%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_COA_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_FUND_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Version_Name as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Budget_Type as string,
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Version_Name as string,
		Budget_ID as long,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Version_Name]\n      ,[Budget_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Budget_Type]\n      ,[Budget_Date]\n      ,[Budget_Desc]\n      ,[Budget_value]\n      ,[Update_datetime]\n      ,[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Budgets]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Budget_Date,Budget_Desc,Budget_Type,Version_Name)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Budget_Date,Budget_Desc,Budget_Type,Version_Name)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Version_Name = Version_Name,
		Relation_Budget_ID = Budget_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Budget_Type = Budget_Type,
		Relation_Budget_Date = Budget_Date,
		Relation_Budget_Desc = Budget_Desc,
		Relation_Budget_value = Budget_value,
		Relation_Update_datetime = Update_datetime,
		Relation_record_deleted_flag = record_deleted_flag,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Version_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I'),
		Budget_ID = toLong(null())) ~> AddAuditColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-', $ProcessName, $FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I'),
		Budget_ID = toLong(null())) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1),
		insert_update_flag = toString('U')) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag,
		Budget_ID,
		Version_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Budget_ID = Relation_Budget_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		GL_Code = Relation_GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit = Relation_Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Type = Relation_Budget_Type,
		Budget_Date = Relation_Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc = Relation_Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value = Relation_Budget_value,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		Update_datetime = Relation_Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		insert_update_flag,
		Version_Name = Relation_Version_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
UnionForDB select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag,
		Budget_ID,
		Version_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectOutput
SelectOutput sink(input(
		Version_Name as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Date as string,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Update_datetime as string,
		record_deleted_flag as string,
		process_name as string,
		insert_update_flag as string,
		Budget_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['BudgetLoadReadyFile.txt'],
	mapColumn(
		Version_Name,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag,
		Budget_ID
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> InsertUpdateRecords

source(output(
		Version_Name as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		insert_update_flag as string,
		Budget_ID as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['BudgetLoadReadyFile.txt']) ~> LoadReadyFile
ConvertBudgetValueAvoidRounding select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag,
		Version_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInsert
LoadReadyFile filter(insert_update_flag==toString('I')) ~> FilterInsert
FilterInsert derive(Budget_value = toDecimal(Budget_value, 18, 2)) ~> ConvertBudgetValueAvoidRounding
SelectInsert sink(input(
		Budget_ID as long,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Version_Name as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Version_Name,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Type,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> DatabaseTarget

source(output(
		Version_Name as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		insert_update_flag as string,
		Budget_ID as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['BudgetLoadReadyFile.txt']) ~> LoadReadyFile
ConvertBudgetValueAvoidRounding select(mapColumn(
		Version_Name,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag,
		Budget_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUpdate
LoadReadyFile filter(insert_update_flag==toString('U')) ~> FilterUpdate
SelectUpdate alterRow(updateIf(record_deleted_flag==1)) ~> AlterRowUpdateExpire
FilterUpdate derive(Budget_value = toDecimal(Budget_value, 18, 2)) ~> ConvertBudgetValueAvoidRounding
AlterRowUpdateExpire sink(input(
		Budget_ID as long,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Version_Name as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Budget_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Budget_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Version_Name,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Type,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> DatabaseTarget

source(output(
		Version as string,
		Fund as string,
		Asset as string,
		GLCode as string,
		GLDescription as string,
		BudgetDate as string,
		Amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetAssetMaster
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetGLCodes
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
UnionAll derive(Debit_Credit = case(greaterOrEqual( iifNull(toDecimal(Amount,18,2,'###,###.##'),toDecimal('0.00')) ,0),'DR','CR'),
		Trx_Amount = iifNull(abs(toDecimal(Amount,18,2,'###,###.##')),toDecimal('0.00')),
		BudgetDate = iifNull(toTimestamp(concat('01-',BudgetDate),'dd-MMM-yy'), toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00')),
		Budget_Type = toString('Budget')) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Fund,
		Asset_ID = Asset,
		GL_Code = GLCode,
		Budget_Desc = GLDescription,
		Budget_Date = BudgetDate,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_value = Trx_Amount,
		Budget_Type,
		validation_error = Validation_Error,
		Version_Name = Version
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectSourceColumns, SelectFundColumns lookup(Asset == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund == Relation_Fund_ID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupFundAndAsset
GetAssetMaster select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFundColumns
SelectGLData, SelectCOAcolumns lookup(GLCode == Relation_GL_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupGLcode
GetGLCodes select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectCOAcolumns
TransactionValidFundAsset@ValidFundAsset split(not(isNull(GLCode)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionTypeGL@(TransactionTypeGL, TransactionTypeCF)
ValidBudgetDate@ValidBudgetDate select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount,
		Relation_Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGLData
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeCF select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCasfFlowData
LookupGLcode split(GLCode == Relation_GL_Code,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitValidGL@(ValidGL, NotValidGL)
LookupFundAndAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Fund_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionValidFundAsset@(ValidFundAsset, InvalidFundAsset)
DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundAssetData
TransactionValidFundAsset@InvalidFundAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Fund or Asset')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund
ConditionalSplitValidGL@NotValidGL derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid GL Code')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL
DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidGLdata
ConditionalSplitValidGL@ValidGL select(mapColumn(
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		Version
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidGLdata
SelectValidGLdata, SelectInvalidGLdata, SelectCasfFlowData, SelectInvalidFundAssetData, SelectInvalidBudgetDate union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeGL derive(BudgetDateConvert = toTimestamp(concat('01-',BudgetDate),'dd-MMM-yy')) ~> ComputeBudgetDate
ComputeBudgetDate split(not(isNull(BudgetDateConvert)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidBudgetDate@(ValidBudgetDate, InvalidBudgetDate)
ValidBudgetDate@InvalidBudgetDate derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Budget Date')) ~> DerivedColumnInvalidBudgetDate
DerivedColumnInvalidBudgetDate select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLCode,
		GLDescription,
		BudgetDate,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectInvalidBudgetDate
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Version_Name as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Budget_Type as string,
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Version_Name,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		validation_error
	)) ~> StagingDB
